processing:
Thank you for shopping with MarlasFashions.com!
Your order #{{order_number}} has been successfully placed with the designer.
We'll keep you updated on your order status via text.
Please note: This is an automated message and cannot receive replies. For assistance, feel free to text us at 416-536-2956.
Thanks again, and have a wonderful day!
on the way:
Hi there,
This is Chloe from MarlasFashions.com with exciting news about your order!
Your order is currently en route to our Toronto warehouse. In the next couple of days, we'll send you an update with your Tracking Number or Pickup Details.
Please note: This is an automated message and cannot receive replies. If you need assistance, feel free to text us at 416-536-2956.
Thank you for choosing us! Have a wonderful day!
Best regards, Chloe MarlasFashions.com
ready for pickup:
Hello,
We're excited to let you know that your dress (Order #{{order_number}}) is now ready for pickup at our MarlasFashions.com Showroom!
Pickup Location: 111 Tycos Drive, Unit 100, Toronto, ON
Store Hours: Monday to Saturday: 11 AM – 7 PM Sunday: 12 PM – 6 PM
Seamstress Availability: Wednesday to Friday: 11 AM – 7 PM Saturday: 11 AM – 7 PM Sunday: 12 PM – 6 PM
Please note: We are unable to hold merchandise indefinitely. If your dress is not picked up within 14 DAYS, it may be subject to Holding Charges or Returned to Stock, and a Store Credit will be issued in place of the item.
If you require alterations, please bring your heels and undergarments to your appointment. Seamstress services are available for an additional charge.
Don't forget to have your order number ready at pickup!
Please note: This is an automated message and cannot receive replies. For assistance, feel free to text us at 416-536-2956.
Thank you for shopping with MarlasFashions.com!
pickup2:
Hello
This is the SECOND reminder that your dress (Order #{{order_number}}) is ready for pickup at our MarlasFashions.com Showroom.
Pickup Location: 111 Tycos Drive, Unit 100, Toronto, ON
Store Hours: Monday to Saturday: 11 AM to 7 PM Sunday: 12 PM to 6 PM
Please be advised that we cannot hold merchandise indefinitely. If your dress is not picked up within 7 DAYS, it may be subject to Holding Charges or Returned to Stock, and a Store Credit will be issued in place of the item.
If you require alterations, our seamstress is available Wednesday to Sunday during store hours. Please bring your heels and undergarments for fitting.
Note: Seamstress services are available at an additional charge. Please note: This is an automated message and cannot receive replies. If you need any assistance, feel free to text us at 416-536-2956.
pickup3:
Hello,
As we have not received a response, your dress (Order #{{order_number}}) is now being returned to the store floor. A store credit has been issued to your account, which can be used toward a future purchase at MarlasFashions.com.
Please note, we are unable to hold items beyond the pickup window without prior arrangements.
If you have any questions regarding your store credit or future purchases, feel free to contact us at 416-536-2956.
Thank you for your understanding.
MLN:
Hi there,
This is Chloe from MarlasFashions.com with exciting news about your order!
We're happy to inform you that your order has been processed and is currently on its way to our Toronto warehouse. You'll receive an update when it's ready for delivery, as indicated on your receipt.
Please note, this is an automated message and replies aren't monitored. If you need any assistance, don't hesitate to text us at 416-536-2956.
Thank you for choosing us—we truly appreciate your business! Have a fantastic day!
Best regards, Chloe MarlasFashions.com
alterations pickup:
We are pleased to inform you that your alterations (Order #{{order_number}}) is ready for pickup at Marlas Fashions. Kindly note that pickup is available during the following hours when our seamstress is on-site:
Wednesday to Friday: 11:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Saturday: 11:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Sunday 12:00 PM – 5:00 PM
Please ensure pickup within 2 weeks. After this period, Storage Fees will apply. Kindly have your order number handy when you arrive for pickup.
Thank you for choosing Marlas Fashions.
alterations pickup2:
Hello,
This is a friendly reminder from Marlas Fashions that your alterations (Order #{{order_number}}) is ready for pickup.
Please note that pickup must be completed within 1 week to avoid storage fees. Our seamstress is available during the following hours:
Wednesday to Friday: 11:00 AM – 6:00 PM
Saturday: 11:00 AM – 6:00 PM
Sunday: 12:00 PM – 5:00 PM
Kindly have your order number handy when you come in.
Thank you,
Marlas Fashions
alterations pickup3:
This is a final reminder from Marlas Fashions regarding your alterations (Order #{{order_number}}). It has now been 2 weeks since your order was completed and is still awaiting pickup.
As of today, storage fees will apply. To avoid further charges, we kindly ask that you pick up your item as soon as possible. Our seamstress is available during the following hours:
Wednesday to Friday: 11:00 AM – 6:00 PM
Saturday: 11:00 AM – 6:00 PM
Sunday: 12:00 PM – 5:00 PM
Please have your order number handy at pickup.
Thank you,
Marlas Fashions
partially paid1:
Hello,
We are pleased to inform you that your dress (Order #{{order_number}}) is now ready for pickup at the MarlasFashions.com showroom.
IMPORTANT NOTICE: There is a remaining balance of: $_________.
If the remaining balance for your dress is not paid within 14 days from the date of this notice, the dress will be placed on the Showroom Floor for Resale.
Any deposit made will be converted into a Store Credit. We strongly encourage you to arrange payment and pickup within this timeframe to avoid this outcome.
Pickup Location: 111 Tycos Drive, Unit 100, Toronto, ON
Store Hours: Monday to Saturday: 11 AM to 7 PM Sunday: 12 PM to 6 PM
Please have your order number available upon pickup.
Additionally, we have also sent an email which will allow you to pay for the remaining balance if you are unable to come into the store.
Feel free to contact us with any questions.
Thank you,
Marlas Fashions
partially paid2:
Hello,
This is a second reminder that the remaining balance for your dress (Order #{{order_number}}) is still unpaid. You have 7 days to complete the payment and pick up your dress.
IMPORTANT: There is a remaining balance of: $_________.
If payment and pickup are not completed within the next 7 days, your dress will be placed on the Showroom Floor for Resale, and any deposit will be converted into a Store Credit.
Pickup Location: 111 Tycos Drive, Unit 100, Toronto, ON
Store Hours: Monday to Saturday: 11 AM to 7 PM Sunday: 12 PM to 6 PM
Additionally, we have also sent an email which will allow you to pay for the remaining balance if you are unable to come into the store.
Please address this matter promptly to avoid any inconvenience.
Thank you,
Marlas Fashions
partially paid3:
Hello,
This is your FINAL REMINDER that the remaining balance for your dress (Order #{{order_number}}) must be paid and the dress picked up within 24 hours.
IMPORTANT: There is a remaining balance of: $_________.
If the balance is not settled by the deadline, your dress will be PLACED ON THE SHOWROOM FLOOR for resale. Any deposit will be CONVERTED INTO STORE CREDIT.
Pickup Location: 111 Tycos Drive, Unit 100, Toronto, ON
Store Hours: Monday to Saturday: 11 AM to 7 PM Sunday: 12 PM to 6 PM
Please ensure this matter is resolved within the next 24 hours.
Additionally, we have also sent an email which will allow you to pay for the remaining balance if you are unable to come into the store.
Thank you,
Marlas Fashions
